question:
You need to translate a document into a different language, and you have a friend who speaks that language. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:
- Explain what the document is why you need a translation
- Explain why this is urgent and important to you
- Ask your friend if and when he/she will be able to help you
text: I hope your new job is going well. I'm writing to ask for your help in something which is very urgent for me.

You know I'm currently living in Mohia Apartments. So, the landlord of my house to planning to sell his flat and has asked me to find a new house. Luckily, I have found another flat in the same building, but they have given me the lease agreement in the Punjabi language which I have to get translated before signing it. Although I tried to find a translator nearby, I couldn't find any.

As we both studied all our classes together, it came to my mind that you had taken punjabi language as your optional course in the school, and you were pretty good in that. Now, it is really important for me to sign this agreement today itself so that I can move in to the other house by tomorrow. Before that, it's a must to get it translated so that I can understand all the terms and condition written in that document.

I know you have a travelling job and your schedule is really hectic during weekdays but this is something for which you have to take out some time. If you are in this region only then please come to my house when you get some time, or else let me know and I will come to your place in the evening.
I hope you will be able to take out time to help me in this situation.
